categoryDescription: Savory street food snacks typically served with a variety of chutneys.
Fragrant rice dish layered with marinated meat or vegetables and spices.
Traditional Indian gravies, rich in spices and flavor.
Clay oven-cooked dishes with a smoky flavor.
Varieties of flatbreads such as naan, roti, and paratha.
Indian desserts like gulab jamun, jalebi, and rasgulla.
Delicacies like dosa, idli, and sambar from southern India.
An assortment of Indian dishes served together in one platter.
